p: Among the 52 DENV fatal cases investigated by the arbovirus surveillance network between 2012 and 2019, 9 were infected by DENV-4. These nine cases were identified between 2016 and 2019. In Vientiane Capital, four cases were detected in September 2016, August 2017, January 2019, and December 2019. In Attapeu province, 2 DENV-4 fatal cases were identified in July and September 2017. Two fatal cases were also recorded in June 2018 in Xayaboury and Champassak provinces and 1 case in Saravane province in April 2019 ( Figure S1).
